The best option to start trading. On the Forex market, you will easily master the mechanics of trading and the principles of analysis
Opportunities for scalping and long-term investments. The metal market is suitable for active trading and saving capital
A lot of assets for professional trading. The stock market will allow you to receive passive profits and make profitable transactions
Commodities for conservative trade. The commodity market is as predictable as possible and allows you to make money with minimum skills
The most reliable investment. On the indices market, you can invest with a 100 % guarantee of profitability
Unlimited opportunities for earning money. The crypto asset market is promising startups, constant fluctuations and huge revenues
The Forex market opens up wide opportunities for beginners and experienced traders. Here you can create your own trading strategies and use them to make successful transactions
It is enough to study political and economic news to predict the direction of movement of currency
Modern technologies and large aggregators of liquidity will allow you to make transactions in less than a second
There are dozens of assets on the Forex market, each of which can, in the future, bring profit to traders
Forget about a fixed work schedule - you can trade on Forex at any time convenient for you
Forex is a place where the largest investment funds trade on a par with ordinary traders. Here you can open transactions of any scale, and the profit depends only on your knowledge and skills

The precious metals market is unique in its own way. The assets that are represented on it (gold, silver, etc.) are volatile in the short term, but they maintain a stable exchange rate for years and even decades. Accordingly, here you can conduct active trading and save capital in times of crisis
You can start trading on the metal market with a minimum amount on deposit, thanks to the possibilities of CFD contracts and microlots
We strive to reduce the costs of traders as much as possible, and the Company Name team has achieved impressive success on the metal market
Investing in precious metals will help you to wait out any market fluctuations without financial losses
Just like currencies, precious metals are affected by a minimum number of financial indicators
The metal market is suitable for traders with any trading style. A cautious investor and an aggressive trader will be able to achieve their goals by trading here

The market of securities issued by the world's largest companies. One of the oldest and largest markets in the world. Here you can apply several trading strategies at once, from investing to generate passive income, to actively concluding transactions for thousands of dollars
Dozens of stocks of financial giants are traded on the market, and new promising companies annually go to IPO
By purchasing the company's securities, you will be able to receive guaranteed and on an ongoing basis % from it income
CFD contracts technology allows you to earn both on the growth and on the fall of stock prices - you can earn income even in the midst of a crisis
Also, thanks to CFDs and microlots, you can open transactions for minimal amounts, even if 1 stock costs hundreds of dollars

On the stock market, you can earn and save a fortune. Here, both active trading and passive income are available to you, and investments in promising IPOs allow you to increase your capital several times in a matter of days

On the commodity market, assets are traded that we encounter to some extent in everyday life. We are talking about oil, gas, wheat, sugar, juice, etc. even without in-depth knowledge of fundamental and technical analysis, you will be able to predict the price movement on the commodity asset market
There are regular and cyclical price movements on the commodity market: it is enough just to study the news to understand when to make a deal
Leverage instrument will allow you to use an amount several times higher than the size of your deposit for trading
Commodities are a wide group of assets, each with its own characteristics and specifics, and each, with the right strategy, will bring you income
The commodity market, like Forex, is the best place for novice traders, due to the minimum requirements for experience and the deposit amount

The commodity market is ideally suited for conservative traders who want to receive a stable income. Here you will not be able to invest money in a startup, having received hundreds of percent of profit, but the cyclicity and simplicity will allow you to earn on a regular basis

The most unusual assets on our platform are traded on the stock indices market. Stock indices are a conditional asset whose price depends on the value of an entire industry or market. Research shows that in the long term, markets and industries are guaranteed to grow, respectively, indices are an investment opportunity with a 100% probability of making a profit
Company Name provides its clients with minimal costs in the trading process: here you can earn, almost without expenses
All traders and even funds invest in indices without exception: all because it is the most reliable asset for preserving capital
Company Name receives data from the world's most reliable liquidity aggregators and provides clients with instant execution of any transactions
Indices are a kind of expensive assets, but CFD technology will allow you to open transactions for minimal amounts

The indices market is the best place for investors. Such assets are most often used not for active trading, but for passive and long-term investments. By investing in stock indices, you can be sure that after some time it will increase

The most popular and highly profitable commodities of the crypto industry are available to you on the cryptocurrency market: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, etc. In addition, the crypto market is a market for startups and IPOs, which allow you to significantly increase the invested capital
Crypto market opens up unlimited prospects for all categories of traders here you can trade with almost any capital
Trading on the crypto market does not incur any costs, except for the commission Company Name, which was and remains minimal
The prices of cryptocurrencies directly depend on the news about them: you do not need to use analysis - just study the current information guides
Every startup can become a unicorn, and every crypto coin can become an asset that will bring hundreds of % of profitability to traders

Cryptocurrencies are the youngest and actively developing market in the world. This explains its volatility and high profitability. There are serious risks waiting for you here, but a huge profit will cover any possible costs
Company Name provides a complete list of instruments for successful trading. On this page you can get acquainted with each of them
Instrument for predicting the results of a transaction

Instrument:
specify the selected financial instrument from the list

Price:
specify the estimated price of opening and closing the order to see the possible result

Trade volume:
specify exact trade volume in lots

Spread in points:
calculated automatically based on the difference between Ask and Bid prices

Swap in USD:
calculated automatically based on the cost of position rollover at night

Margin:
the specified data is the minimum amount of free deposit required to make a transaction

Profit:
indication of probable profit based on current parameters
